summary: This module supplies utilities for generating Bokehâ€‘based visualizations of Dask profiling data, including task execution timelines, resource consumption, and cache activity, together with helper functions for color selection, bounds adjustment, and task name formatting.
business_intent: Provide an interactive, graphical way for developers and operators to inspect and diagnose Dask performance characteristics, helping them identify bottlenecks, optimize resource usage, and improve overall application efficiency.
